back.image: School building> Nathan Hale Schoolhouse, New London, Conn.
back.text: Tues July 23 '07. The joke's on me. I sent you a card yesterday & forgot to stamp it. Absent minded as I am you will get notice before long for some mail at New London. Came here last [Mon.]
Rec'd your letter yesterday [unk.]. Glad to hear from you
